alert.note: Alert for Glasscock; Reagan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 12 at 9:52PM CDT until May 12 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland/Odessa has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Eastern Glasscock County in western Texas... North Central Reagan County in western Texas... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 952 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Public reports from Garden City show flooding along roadways and yards. . Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 4 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Garden City and Saint Lawrence. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
